response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,500,000 to me personally, but I understand its true worth to you might be $800,000. My proposal is to offer it to you for $1,200,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between our interests. Should you decide to accept this offer, I assure you that you will not only receive a valuable asset but also benefit from my commitment to ensuring a seamless and professional transaction. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1200000}
